nodes.text: Vontok was a male Nothoiin. By the time of the Iron Blockade, he worked as a demolitions expert and combat engineer in the Anoat sector. A dauntless fighter, Vontok did not hesitate to join his warrior comrades into a full firefight.
In the 2015 iOS video game Star Wars: Uprising, Vontok is one of the many crew members that can be sent on Crew Runs for helpful items.
